column4: you could use Hackintosh on the Dell, but it's not legal. Keep yourself ti Ubuntu and if you need mac software well try to find a substitute, the other option is obvious
macintosh is legal, just not legal to distribute.
sorry, hacintosh is legal, just illegal to distribute.
hacintosh's are LEGAL, you just can't distribute the software. apple won't support it. check out psylon or whatever company is selling hacintoshs.
